name: HILO
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en:
A simplified crypto predictions platform Binary token price predictions in a simple Up / Down mechanism.

- No risk of liquidation

- Hedge against volatile markets

- Bi-directional access to tokens that have no perpetual futures listing
